translation.en: We should've done this ourselves.
We know the king's palace better than your patsy does.
translation.it: Conosciamo il palazzo meglio della tua gonza.

translation.en: Teela hasn't failed us yet.
translation.it: Teela non ci ha mai delusi.

translation.en: She'll find what we seek.
With that sword, the Power of Grayskull
translation.it: Con quella spada, il Potere di Grayskull sarà presto nostro.

translation.en: will soon be ours.
translation.it: il Potere di Grayskull sarà presto nostro.

translation.en: How's the nation of Eternos this evening? Quiet as a shadow, King Randor.
translation.it: - Com'è Eternos, stasera? - Silenziosa come un'ombra, Re Randor.

translation.en: Never trust shadows, General.
You catch that game of modulok? No, modulok's too complicated.
translation.it: - Hai visto la partita di Modulok? - No. È troppo complicato.

translation.en: Running on your hands and passing with your feet?
translation.it: Correre sulle mani e passare coi piedi?

translation.en: [sucks teeth] No, thank you.
I'll take it from here, Soldier.
Of course, General Dolos.
I'll take it from here, Soldier.
Evelyn better pay me this time.
translation.it: Meglio che stavolta Evelyn mi paghi.

translation.en: Oh, come on!
'Word witch didn't say there'd be this many to choose from. -Okay. -[knuckles crack]
translation.it: Non ha detto che ce ne sarebbero stati così tanti. Ok.

translation.en: Which one of you is gonna give me that trademark Teela Grayskull tingle?
translation.it: Chi di voi mi darà quel tipico fremito di Grayskull?

translation.en: I've been contracted to go through all this trouble to steal a--
translation.it: Mi sono sforzata tanto solo per rubare…

translation.en: [woman's voice echoing] Sword, Eternia, Grayskull, secrets, Eternia, Power,
Masters of the Universe, Masters of the Universe.
That was way more than a tingle. [soldier] Drop the sword!
translation.it: - Era più di un fremito. - Getta la spada!

translation.en: I'll just put it right... here.
Did she just continue to steal?
Sorry. [chuckles] I just needed my hands free to do... this.
translation.it: Scusate, mi servivano le mani libere!

translation.en: Oh, no!
How will we ever grab our swords with our other hands?
translation.it: Come prenderemo le spade con le altre mani?

translation.en: Oh, sorry. My thumb stuck. Able to do... this!
translation.it: Scusate, ho il pollice bloccato. Le mani libere!

translation.en: Oh, yeah, much better.
[solider] Somebody stop her!
-You! Halt! -[blasters firing] Get her now!
Go! Go! Get her!
Ah-ha-ha, one of my legs fell asleep, sorry. Must you have brought your apprentice along?
translation.it: - Mi si è addormentata la gamba. Scusate. - Dovevi portare l'apprendista?

translation.en: [soldier] You! Halt!
Duncan didn't bring the Royal Guard to the extraction point. Just sayin'.
translation.it: Lui non ha portato qui la Guardia Reale. Così, per dire.

translation.en: Incoming!
What an unfortunate turn of events...
for them.
No! They're just doing their jobs!
translation.it: No! Fanno solo il loro lavoro!

translation.en: Give me the sword, Hand Witch.
translation.it: Dammi la spada, strega delle mani!

translation.en: [woman's voice echoing] That sword does not belong to her.
Start the engine, kid. This is a bust. We're on our way to you.
translation.it: Accendi il motore. Missione fallita. Arriviamo.

translation.en: The sword is right there.
Our key to universal unstoppable power is right there!
translation.it: La nostra chiave per un potere inarrestabile è lì!

translation.en: We don't gotta find the sword again, just the girl. Let's move.
translation.it: Non serve trovare la spada, solo la ragazza. Andiamo.

translation.en: [woman's voice echoing] Bring the sword to the champion.
What champion?
I have the Power!
[singer] ♪ The Power is ours ♪
translation.it: È dentro di noi, il nostro potere

translation.en: ♪ It's in our so-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-oul ♪
translation.it: È dentro di noi, il nostro potere Oh

translation.en: ♪ The Power is ours ♪
translation.it: È dentro di noi, il nostro potere

translation.en: ♪ It's in our so-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-oul ♪
translation.it: È dentro di noi, il nostro potere Oh

translation.en: ♪ The Power is ours ♪
♪ Hey, we'll find our purpose ♪
translation.it: È dentro di noi, ehi! Il nostro scopo

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause we know we're worth it ♪
♪ And we'll be remembered ♪
♪ We are the defenders, defenders ♪
-♪ Oh ♪ -♪ We fight for the win ♪
♪ We fight till the end ♪
-♪ We fight for the win ♪ -♪ The Power is ours ♪
translation.it: Non molleremo, no - Noi lotteremo - È dentro di noi, il nostro potere

translation.en: ♪ It's in our soul ♪
translation.it: - Noi lotteremo - È dentro di noi, il nostro potere

translation.en: Hang in there, Kitty. I've got you.
Just crawl onto my shoulders and we can both go home. No.
translation.it: - Salimi in spalla e torniamo a casa. - No.

translation.en: What do you mean, no?
I don't want us to fall. We won't fall.
translation.it: - Non voglio che cadiamo. - Non cadremo.

translation.en: We won't fall...
...if you get on my shoulders right now.
translation.it: se mi sali subito in spalla!

translation.en: Did you, like, eat rocks today?
I thought they were potatoes. [man] Did they taste like potatoes?
translation.it: - Pensavo fossero patate. - Sapevano di patate?

translation.en: [Kitty] I've never had a potato before.
translation.it: Non ne ho mai mangiata una.

translation.en: -[grunts] -How am I supposed to know?
You jump the rest of the way. What about you?
I'll be fine.
Dragonfly.
-No. -Dragonfly.
No, don't do it. Focus.
Dragonfly!
[woman] Adam, are you two done yet? Or do you wanna hang out some more?
translation.it: Adam, avete finito? O prevedete altre cadute di stile?

translation.en: How long have you been there? Long enough to work on that joke.
translation.it: - Da quanto sei lì? - Abbastanza da pensare a una battuta.

translation.en: Thought it might defuse the tension. Way to take my mind off of imminent death, Krass.
translation.it: - Volevo allentare la tensione. - Grazie di non farmi pensare che morirò.

translation.en: Thanks. What are best friends for?
translation.it: - Grazie. - Gli amici servono a questo.

translation.en: You weren't on tracker duty today.
What are you doing out here? Cringer's missing,
translation.it: - Che fai qui? - Cringer è scomparso.

translation.en: and this part of the woods has the best snacks for grabbing,
translation.it: E questa parte di bosco ha gli snack migliori.

translation.en: so I figured why not start looking for him here?
translation.it: Quindi ho pensato di cercarlo qui.

translation.en: Wait, did you just say Cringer was missing?
Kitty, did you come out here looking for your uncle?
translation.it: Kitty, eri qui per cercare tuo zio?

translation.en: Maybe. He said he wanted to go hunting again.
translation.it: Forse. Ha detto di voler cacciare di nuovo.

translation.en: Puh! He can't hunt without claws. Try telling him that.
translation.it: - Non può cacciare senza artigli! - Prova a dirlo a lui.

translation.en: [poacher bot 1] Contain. Shut.
-[snarls] -Push.
Release me, or incur the wrath of my tribe,
translation.it: Liberatemi, o affronterete la mia tribù, bruti Bestiopoidi!

translation.en: you Beastopoid brutes.
translation.it: o affronterete la mia tribù, bruti Bestiopoidi!

translation.en: [poacher bot 1] Quarry talks like it is people. [poacher bot 2] Quarry talks like we are people.
translation.it: - Parla da umano. - Parla come se fossimo umani.

translation.en: Don't you poachers want more from life than caging and hurting animals?
translation.it: Voi bracconieri volete solo catturare e ferire animali?

translation.en: Why not rise up against your keeper? Try living for yourselves.
translation.it: Insorgete contro il padrone. Vivete per voi stessi.

translation.en: [poacher bot 1] Initiate capture.
An uprising would displease our keeper.
translation.it: Insorgere turberebbe il padrone. Domanda per la preda.

translation.en: Query for quarry: what happened to you
translation.it: Insorgere turberebbe il padrone. Domanda per la preda. Cosa accadde, quando tu turbasti il padrone?

translation.en: when last you displeased our keeper?
translation.it: Cosa accadde, quando tu turbasti il padrone?

translation.en: Fair point, my subservient captors.
[poacher bot 2] R'qazz will be most pleased to have you back in the fight pit.
translation.it: R'Qazz sarà felice di riaverti nella fossa di combattimento.

translation.en: [poacher bot 1] He may add your skull to his trophy belt after your loss.
translation.it: Aggiungerà il tuo cranio ai trofei dopo la tua sconfitta.

translation.en: Oh, what an honor.
Let me at those circuit brains. No time for the bots.
translation.it: - Teste di circuito… - Non c'è tempo.

translation.en: We gotta spring Cringer.
I knew you'd come for me.
We needed a faster ride home anyway. Stand back.
Hang on!
[poacher bot 1] Initiate stowaway protocol.
Great plan! Now what?
You up for a game of ram-ball?
I'm wearing my helmet, ain't I?
Adam of the Tiger Tribe risks it all... ...to send Krass to the net.
translation.it: Adam della Tribù delle Tigri rischia tutto per mandare Krass a rete.

translation.en: Will she make the...
[sighs] Have I mentioned how much I hate this game?
translation.it: Ho detto quanto odio questo gioco?

translation.en: ...goal? [shouts, laughs]
Ow! Whoa!
[grunts] Ow.
Happy to see you too. But hug me any tighter, and I'll let them keep you next time.
translation.it: Anch'io sono felice, ma fai piano, o la prossima volta ti lascio a loro.

translation.en: Wait. What happened to Krass?
Tiger Tribe for the win!
Cringer, next time you feel like taking on some Beastopoids, let us know, huh?
translation.it: Cringer! La prossima volta che affronti i Bestiopoidi, diccelo.

translation.en: Now, where would the fun in that be?
Tiger Tribe forever? [both] Tiger Tribe forever.
translation.it: - Tribù delle Tigri per sempre? - Tribù delle Tigri per sempre!

translation.en: Why would you go hunting alone again? Everyone in the tribe does their part.
translation.it: - Perché vai a caccia da solo? - Tutti nella tribù contribuiscono.

translation.en: Even without my claws, I'd like to still do mine.
translation.it: Anche senza artigli, vorrei farlo anch'io.

translation.en: Spoken like a true "Stripe."
translation.it: È lo spirito di chi ha le strisce!

translation.en: I don't need a special tattoo to be a part of the tribe.
translation.it: Non servono tatuaggi per far parte della tribù.

translation.en: You keep saying that, but I never see you leave.
translation.it: Continui a dirlo, ma non ti vedo mai andar via.

translation.en: Now, now, Krass'tine. Every lost soul the tribe adopts
translation.it: Dai, Krasstine. Ogni anima perduta adottata dalla tribù

translation.en: gets their stripes when they so choose.
If Adam isn't ready to set aside his cuff and get his stripe,
translation.it: Se non è pronto a lasciare il bracciale e a farlo,

translation.en: Adam isn't ready.
This is all I have from my life before.
translation.it: È tutto ciò che ho del passato.

translation.en: What if whoever lost me doesn't recognize me without this?
translation.it: E se chi mi ha perso non mi riconoscesse, senza?

translation.en: It's been ten years. Ah, they probably stopped looking for you by now.
translation.it: Sono passati dieci anni. Probabilmente hanno smesso di cercarti.

translation.en: Whatever, helmet head.
translation.it: Come ti pare, testa di casco.

translation.en: Kitty, what you doing? There's a lady in the tree.
translation.it: - Kitty? Che fai? - C'è una donna su un albero.

translation.en: [Adam] Um, can we help you, tree lady?
Uh, your village is full of cats.
translation.it: Il vostro villaggio è pieno di felini.

translation.en: I'm apparently afraid of cats.
translation.it: Pare che io ne abbia paura.

translation.en: Then why did you come out here to where the Tiger Tribe lives?
translation.it: E perché sei venuta dove vive la Tribù delle Tigri?

translation.en: [Teela] A voice in my head told me to.
translation.it: Me l'ha detto una voce nella testa?

translation.en: Ask it how much it knows about cats being able to climb trees.
translation.it: Chiedi se sa che i felini s'arrampicano.

translation.en: Why?
I got her!
Adam. Teela.
Magic!
-What if she got caught? -[Kronis] We'd know.
translation.it: E se l'hanno presa? Lo sapremmo. Ascolto i canali di sicurezza reali.

translation.en: I've been listening to the Royal security channels.
translation.it: Lo sapremmo. Ascolto i canali di sicurezza reali.

translation.en: Right, because of all the crime we're doing.
translation.it: Già, per i crimini che commettiamo.

translation.en: This is about revenge on the king,
We're not not doing crime, though.
translation.it: Ma non stiamo non commettendo crimini.

translation.en: You find her yet?
We're here. Descend.
[Duncan] Is that an actual poacher ship?
The sword doesn't want her found.
Think I can get these poacher bots up and running to hunt her scent.
translation.it: Posso far seguire il suo odore ai Bracco-Bot.

translation.en: Do it. Find the traitorous whelp.
Apprentice, get to work.
[Teela] Why aren't you afraid of magic like the rest of your people? To be clear, the cats don't like magic.
translation.it: - Perché non temi la magia come gli altri? - È ai felini che non piace.

translation.en: Why let yourself get captured?
[sighs] You wouldn't understand.
Oh, because I'm from the jungle and you're from the city?
translation.it: Perché io vengo dalla giungla e tu dalla città?

translation.en: Believe me, you're from the city.
I am?
Yeah, your accent sounds like you were born into an upper family.
translation.it: Sì, hai un accento di buona famiglia.

translation.en: Just count your lucky stars you're out here and not back in the house that Randor built.
translation.it: Sei fortunato che sei qui e non nella casa costruita da Randor.

translation.en: You don't like the king? No one likes the king,
translation.it: - Non ti piace il re? - A nessuno piace.

translation.en: especially at street level... or below street level, which is where I usually am.
translation.it: Specialmente alla gente di strada. O a quella al di sotto, che è dove sto io.

translation.en: Randor won't do anything about all the poaching out here, so he's no friend of the tribe's either.
translation.it: Randor non fa nulla contro i bracconieri, quindi non è amico delle tribù.

translation.en: And now that we're done bonding,
shouldn't you be getting back to doing whatever the voice in your head told you to?
translation.it: non dovresti fare ciò che ti diceva di fare la voce?

translation.en: Like I said... you wouldn't understand.
Try me.
That isn't jealousy I smell... [sniffs] ...is it?
translation.it: Non è gelosia che odoro, vero?

translation.en: Oh, of course not.
Adam's like a brother to me.
I'm just worried he's gonna leave.
Some flashy magic wielder showing up isn't gonna help anything.
translation.it: Una maga appariscente non aiuterà con ciò.

translation.en: And it's a problem we can't solve by ramming it with your helmet, I assume.
translation.it: Ed è un problema che non si risolve colpendolo col casco.

translation.en: Every problem can be solved by ramming it with my helmet.
We may have a different problem for you to ram.
[Teela] So the voice in my head led me here to deliver a package.
translation.it: La voce mi ha portata qui a consegnare un pacco.

translation.en: To who?
You don't happen to have any champions out here, do you?
translation.it: Non avete campioni, là fuori, vero?

translation.en: Being a champion
is about defending those who can't defend themselves.
translation.it: difende chi non può farlo fa solo.

translation.en: That was weird. Where did that come from?
[man] Are those poacher bots?
Give us the Witch.
Halt. Do not move.
Tiger Tribe answers to no one!
Technology! I need to protect the village.
We'll find the girl and the sword once everyone's dead.
translation.it: Troveremo ragazza e spada dopo averli uccisi.

translation.en: Duncan, have the robots burn the village.
No, no, no, I--
I can't do that.
Coward.
I'll run out first. Then you get this as far from here as quickly as you can. Hide it.
translation.it: Io esco. Tu porta questa il più lontano possibile. Nascondila.

translation.en: If I survive, my voice and I will come back for it.
translation.it: Se sopravvivo, la mia voce e io torneremo a prenderla.

translation.en: [man] We need water! Please--
translation.it: Al fuoco! Ci serve acqua! Presto!

translation.en: [woman] Fire! We need to save the village!
translation.it: Al fuoco! Dobbiamo salvare il villaggio!

translation.en: Capture.
Ah, thank you, kind stranger.
[shrieks] Talking tiger!
Whoa! Flying child!
Krass, stand down. He saved me.
Hey, Evelyn.
There she is.
They don't get to attack us and run without a fight.
translation.it: Non possono attaccarci e andarsene senza combattere.

translation.en: Come on, Cringer.
[poacher bot] Intercept. Capture.
Contain.
Do not run.
Stop.
Error.
[grunts] Whoa!
Hang on. I've got you. [grunts] Don't worry. This is my favorite cliff.
translation.it: Resisti, ti tengo! Tranquilla. È la mia rupe preferita.

translation.en: I almost die here all the time.
I told you to get away from here.
translation.it: Ti avevo detto di andar via!

translation.en: [Krass grunts] Get the real sword out of here. I had a sword this whole time?
translation.it: - Porta la vera spada via da qui! - Avevo con me una spada?

translation.en: Hand it over, thief.
You want this? Come and get it.
"By the Power of Grayskull, I have the Power"?
translation.it: "Per il Potere di Grayskull, a me il potere?"

translation.en: I have the Power!
-What? -No!
What? He's... a man.
The Power of Grayskull.
Will never be yours!
The Power of Grayskull...
...belongs to me!
